00188         // Set to "true" if the internal variables sxM, syM, rxxM and rxyM
00189         // are changed due to adding/removing vector pair(s) x/y.

00191 
00192         // The no. of data vector pairs x/y used for training of the model.
00193         unsigned countM;
00194 
00195         // Given k data vectors x with dimension n and the corresponding
00196         // k vectors y with dimension m, this n-dimensional vector 
00197         // contains the sum of all x_l for l = 1,...,k.
00198         Array  < double > sxM;
00199 
00200         // Given k data vectors x with dimension n and the corresponding
00201         // k vectors y with dimension m, this n-dimensional vector 
00202         // contains the sum of all y_l for l = 1,...,k.
00203         Array  < double > syM;
00204 
00205         // Given k data vectors x with dimension n and the corresponding
00206         // k vectors y with dimension m, this n x n matrix contains the
00207         // sum of all s_l for l = 1,...,k with s_l = x_i * x_j
00208         // for i,j = 1,...,n.  
00209         Array2D< double > rxxM;
00210 
00211         // Given k data vectors x with dimension n and the corresponding
00212         // k vectors y with dimension m, this n x m matrix contains the
00213         // sum of all s_l for l = 1,...,k with s_l = x_i * y_j
00214         // for i = 1,...,n and j = 1,...,m.  
00215         Array2D< double > rxyM;
00216 
00217         // The transformation matrix "A" of the model y = Ax + b.
00218         Array2D< double > amatM;
00219 
00220         // The vector "b" of the model y = Ax + b.
00221         Array  < double > bvecM;
